description: I developed back-end systems and APIs for an Audit Trail Management System project, collaborating closely with Business Analysts to understand requirements and design the system architecture. Additionally, I participated in code reviews and pair programming sessions to ensure code quality and maintainability.

I assisted senior developers in building and maintaining back-end systems for mobile applications, gaining hands-on experience with back-end technologies. As part of an Agile development team, I participated in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and sprint reviews. I also collaborated with front-end developers to integrate back-end functionalities with user interfaces, ensuring seamless interaction and functionality.
